headline: Ask HN: Interest in a Complete Code Example of Change Data Capture?
description:
Morning y'all,

I've been a software engineer, with a partial-focus/lean-towards the data engineering space since ~2014, and one of the problems I've seen in this space (and others), is that there just aren't many available code (read: actual code, not diagrams), examples of complex (ish) problems that you can trust.

So, I wanted to gauge interest in two things:

    Are any of you interested in a Complete Code Example: Change Data Capture from RDBMS to Data Warehouse

    Are any of you interested in building/selling access to a Complete Code Example: Change Data Capture from RDBMS to Data Warehouse
A brief survey is linked below, and I'll follow up with the results, because, depending on your use case (being a maker/consumer of the CDC example), it'd be nice to know how many people want this example or can produce it.

SURVEY: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScewADlsyO4-KfjAE-mgr_bqML1gVBn88rH7ifaEVUS-y5GSg/viewform?usp=sf_link

I've personally implemented CDC and ingestion systems, and if you respond and post in this thread, I'll give you a year of access to a complete implementation once it's completed in the next few weeks via https://umkr.com/

Thank you,

Mo
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 对变更数据采集的完整代码实例感兴趣？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 對變更數據採集的完整代碼實例感興趣？
